name: Best, Unique Grilled Cheese
author: bentbrandt
summary: The best sandwich I've ever had that is a spin off of a grilled cheese I had at a ski chalet.
directions: Combine water, vinegar, sugar, red pepper flakes, and garlic in a small saucepan over medium heat; cook and stir until sugar is dissolved and sauce is slightly reduced, about 5 minutes
Heat a skillet over low heat
Spread butter onto 1 side of each bread slice
Spread cream cheese on the opposite side of 1 of the bread slices
Layer Cheddar cheese and pickles on top of the cream cheese layer
Drizzle 1 to 2 tablespoons sauce on the other slice of bread on the side opposite the butter; place bread on top of pickle layer, butter-side on the outside, creating a sandwich
Cook sandwich in the hot skillet until cheese is melted and bread is browned, about 5 minutes per side
Remove top bread piece, add tomatoes to middle, and close sandwich
